I am having trouble having this application function as it should. 
Although it compiles nicely, there does not appear to be any 
functionality that is present after the app is run.
The following 3 lines always appear after the application is run 

loading test.textui.TestRunner.class for debugging...
test.textui.TestRunner.class successfully loaded
Usage: driver [-wait] testCaseName, where name is the name of the 
TestCase class

Also if I try to run the program from a prompt, then I get the 
message :

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: 
junit/textui/TestRunner.

Any help anyone can provide would be greatly appreciated.
subject: Example Money Application for J-Unit Testing
